text: is a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Ueda was born in Mito on August 28, 1998. When he was a Hosei University student, he joined J1 League club Kashima Antlers in July 2019. In May 2019, Ueda was selected the Japan national team for 2019 Copa Am√©rica. At this tournament, he debuted against Chile on June 17.
